document_data.name: Caftan
document_data.mainbody: A '''caftan''' was a long ankle-length garment worn in [[Zakhara]].
document_data.Description: The robe was usually made with cotton, but finer versions could be crafted from [[silk]] or brocade. When worn, a [[sash]] was used as a belt around the waist. Nearly every woman in [[Calimshan]] would dress in a caftan. A typical caftan had a base value of 1 gp, but more elaborate ones could cost up to 20 gp.
